about_the_game:
Welcome to Slaughter League, the next global sports phenomenon. Pit yourself against incinerating flamethrowers, electrifying tesla coils, and of course, those good old-fashioned mutilating buzzsaws using a blend of decisive parkour platforming, all the while being hilariously narrated by our announcers.

Do you have what it takes to brave the Slaughter League and come out in one piece? Warning: the odds are not in your favour (hence the name)!

  • Participate in twisting set piece races, dashing down a track where almost every step leads to a hilariously grisly death for your custom racer, created using 100+ cosmetic items!

  • Try to beat the clock with as few deaths as possible - but remember, sometimes losing a limb or two to a power tool might be worth it to cut a few minutes down the road! That may mean the difference between a Gold and a Perfect rank!

  • The quicker you place, the more Rank Saws you get (don’t cut yourself, these things are sharp). The more Saws you get, the more tracks you unlock, with new and inventive ways to die!

  • Death CAN be all fun and games! Enjoy absurd ragdolling, varied death animations, and world-class commentary. Brutal slaughter has never been more fun!

short_description: Water's cut. Rent's due. Jobs are scarce. Time to get rich. Enter the Slaughter League and win against all odds in supremely lethal races. Platforming meets slaughter in this casual racing game designed for players looking for a new experience - or a way to wind down with blood and guts galore!

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
